description:
'''Daniel Henry Edward Thompson''' (born 4 April 1939) is an English multi-instrumentalist best known as a [[double bass]]ist. He has had a long musical career playing with a large variety of other musicians, particularly [[Richard Thompson (musician)|Richard Thompson]] and [[John Martyn]].

For four years, between 1964 and 1967, he was a member of [[Alexis Korner]]'s [[Blues Incorporated]], led a trio that included guitarist [[John McLaughlin (musician)|John McLaughlin]], and was a founding member of the British folk-jazz band [[Pentangle (band)|Pentangle]]. Since 1987, he has also recorded four solo albums. He converted to [[Islam]] in 1990.
